QuestData.Title: The Ape Hunter's Slave
QuestData.Description: You think you so great hunter, eh? You no Frenzyheart, you not know of hunt.$B$BGoregek is great ape hunter. He slay so many ape you can't count on claws.$B$BYou go with Goregek and hunt hardknuckles to east. You the slave, $r. You do what Goregek tell you.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 8 Hardknuckle Foragers and 6 Hardknuckle Chargers for High-Shaman Rakjak at Frenzyheart Hill.$B$BIf you lose Goregek's Shackles, speak to Elder Harkek in Frenzyheart Hill.
QuestData.CompletionText: You still alive! Hardknuckles not eat you yet?$B$BMaybe they eat you later.
QuestData.RewardText: Goregek show silly $r slave how it done.
